name: Purescript
description:
This plugin provides Purescript language support Features:
  • Syntax highlight
  • Language server support:
    • Annotations
    • Intentions
  • Find usage of:
    • top level declarations
    • parameters
    • imported value declarations:
      • Not imported with `as`
      • not exported with `module`
  • Autocomplete of:
    • top level declarations
    • parameters
    • imported value declarations:
      • Not imported with `as`
      • not exported with `module`
for LSP to work you need to have purescript language server installed in the projects node_modules
notes: Added autocomplete for things that already had find usage
